runAsync(Runnable) - Method in interface com.guflimc.brick.scheduler.api.Scheduler
Executes the given Runnable on a separate thread and returns a CompletableFuture that is completed when the execution is finished.

S

Scheduler - Interface in com.guflimc.brick.scheduler.api
